title: Progressive Era and Social Reform

vocab.definition: Period of social and political reform in early 1900s America
Journalist who exposed corruption and social problems
Government action to break up large business monopolies
Community center providing services to urban poor and immigrants
Right to vote in political elections

teachingNotes: Focus on major reforms and key figures. Connect Progressive ideals to modern social movements.

sample.question: What was the period of social reform in early 1900s called?

truefalse.question: Muckrakers were journalists who exposed social problems.

multiplechoice.question: What provided services to urban poor and immigrants?

fillintheblank.question: Government action to break up monopolies was called trust ________.
